lj.name: 路径
lj.PrepareSQL: select t1.CDZWM, t2.ZWM, t2.LJDM from usr_wfw.T_FX_XTCD t1, usr_wfw.T_FX_LJ t2 where t1.CDDM=t2.SSCDDM

adminuserlist.name: 管理员用户列表
adminuserlist.PrepareSQL: select t1.GLYDM, t1.YHXM, t1.ZCSJ, t1.ZHMC, t2.JSZWM  from USR_WFW.T_FX_GLY t1 left join USR_WFW.T_FX_JS t2 on t1.JSDM=t2.JSDM where t1.JSDM != '-1'

teacheruserlist.name: 教师用户列表
teacheruserlist.PrepareSQL: select t1.ZGH, t1.JSXM, t1.LRSJ from USR_WFW.T_FX_LS t1 left join USR_WFW.T_FX_JS t2 on t1.JSDM=t2.JSDM where t1.JSDM != '-1'

collegeslist.name: 学院列表
collegeslist.PrepareSQL: select * from usr_wfw.T_FX_XY order by XYDM asc

majorlist.name: 专业列表
majorlist.PrepareSQL: select t5.*, t6.XKMC XKMLMC from ( select t3.*, t4.ZYDLMC from (  select t1.*, t2.ZWMC XYZWM from usr_wfw.T_FX_ZY t1 left join usr_wfw.T_FX_XY t2 on t1.XYDM=t2.XYDM ) t3 left join usr_wfw.T_FX_ZYDL t4 on t4.ZYDLDM = t3.ZYDLDM ) t5 left join usr_wfw.T_FX_XKML t6 on t5.XKMLDM=t6.XKDM

collegemajorlist.name: 根据学院代码查专业
collegemajorlist.PrepareSQL: select ZWMC, YWMC, ZYDM, XKMLDM, ZYDLDM from usr_wfw.T_FX_ZY where xydm=?

minormajorlistbyxy.name: 根据学院代码查辅修专业
minormajorlistbyxy.PrepareSQL: select ZWMC, YWMC, ZYDM, XKMLDM, ZYDLDM, SZSJ from usr_wfw.T_FX_FXZY where xydm=?

minormajorlist.name: 某年辅修专业列表
minormajorlist.PrepareSQL: select t1.*, substr(t1.SZSJ, 0, 4) FXNJ , t2.ZWMC XYMC from usr_wfw.T_FX_FXZY t1 left join usr_wfw.T_FX_XY t2 on t1.XYDM=t2.XYDM where to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy')=?

trainingprogram.name: 某学年某专业的辅修培养方案
trainingprogram.PrepareSQL: select * from usr_wfw.T_FX_PYFA where ZYDM=? and substr(XGSJ, 0, 4) = ?

admissionstimelist.name: 招生时间设置列表
admissionstimelist.PrepareSQL: select FXNJ, concat(concat(BMKSSJ, ' - '), BMJZSJ) BMQZSJ, concat(concat(YJDJFKSSJ, ' - '), YJDJFJZSJ) YJDJFQZSJ, concat(concat(EJDJFKSSJ,' - '),EJDJFJZSJ) EJDJFQZSJ, concat(concat(CJLRKSSJ, ' - '), CJLRJZSJ) CJLRQZSJ, concat(concat(CJBGKSSJ,' - '),CJBGJZSJ) CJBGQZSJ from usr_wfw.T_FX_ZSJH_SJ order by FXNJ desc

admissionstimesearch.name: 获取某年的招生计划
admissionstimesearch.PrepareSQL: select FXNJ, BMKSSJ, BMJZSJ ,YJDJFKSSJ,YJDJFJZSJ, EJDJFKSSJ,EJDJFJZSJ, CJLRKSSJ,CJLRJZSJ,CJBGKSSJ,CJBGJZSJ from usr_wfw.T_FX_ZSJH_SJ where FXNJ = ?

getStudentInfo.name: 获取学生信息
getStudentInfo.PrepareSQL: select t.XH,t.KSH,t.XM,t.XBDM,t.MZDM,t.SFZJH,t.DWDM,t.ZYDM,t.RXRQ,t.RXNJ,t.XZNJ,t.ZZMMDM, mz.MC as MZMC, xb.MC as XBMC, xy.ZWMC as XYMC, zy.ZWMC as ZYMC,zzmm.MC as ZZMMMC from usr_zsj.T_BZKS t left join usr_zxbz.T_ZXBZ_MZ mz on t.MZDM=mz.DM left join usr_zxbz.T_ZXBZ_XB xb on t.XBDM=xb.DM left join usr_wfw.T_FX_XY xy on t.DWDM=xy.XYDM left join usr_wfw.T_FX_ZY zy on t.ZYDM=zy.ZYDM left join usr_zxbz.T_ZXBZ_ZZMM zzmm on zzmm.DM=t.ZZMMDM where t.XH=?

enrollstudent.name: 辅修报名学生列表
enrollstudent.PrepareSQL: select SFRZH, XM, XB, MZ, LXDH,  ZXNJ,  FXXY, FXZY from usr_wfw.T_FX_BM

enrollstudentpassed.name: 辅修报名已审核过学生列表
enrollstudentpassed.PrepareSQL: select SFRZH, XM, XB, MZ, LXDH,  FXXY, FXZY from usr_wfw.T_FX_BM wehre SHZT='1'

enrollstudentreject.name: 辅修报名已拒绝学生列表
enrollstudentreject.PrepareSQL: select SFRZH, XM, XB, MZ, LXDH, ZXXY, ZXZY, ZXNJ, ZXZY,  FXXY, FXZY from usr_wfw.T_FX_BM wehre SHZT='0'

enrollplan.name: 某年某专业招生计划
enrollplan.PrepareSQL: select * from usr_wfw.T_FX_ZSJH where zydm=? and fxnf=?
